body.name: Lush Decor Sheer Grommet Curtains With Insulated Blackout Lining, Window Curtain Panels, Pair, 38"W x 95"L, Wheat - Curtain With Sheer Overlay, Elegant Blackout Curtains for Bedroom
features: Chic Window Decor: The Lush Decor Sheer Grommet Curtains With Insulated Blackout Lining adds luxury to your space while giving you multiple looks in one set. The white sheer overlay and classic solid-color design fits in nearly any home decor style.

Blackout Curtains: These panels offer you the best of both worlds with the option of nearly complete blackout or sheer, together in one set. The blackout lining not only blocks out sunlight, but also reduces external noise, and regulates room temperature.

Tulle Overlay: These curtains measure 38 inches width by 95 inches length. With 2 layers, these panels let you customize your look using tie backs (not included). The sheer overlay allows lots of natural light to your space while still providing privacy.

Easy Installation: Sold as a set of 2 panels, these curtains offer seamless installation with metal grommets. Measuring 1.5" in diameter, easily slide your curtain rod through these grommets. Complement your neutral bedroom decor with this elegant set.
Care and Maintenance: To care for these curtains, machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Do not wring and hang to dry. If needed, use a steamer to release wrinkles or a non-chlorine bleach for cleaning.

About Us: Lush Decor crafts beautiful home decor for every room, style and age. Our luxury-for-less styles are designed to inspire. From timeless neutrals, rich textures and vibrant colors, we help you dress your space to reflect your personal style.
Lush Decor: Woman Founded, Women Led Brand
body.description: The Lush Decor Sheer Grommet Curtains With Insulated Blackout Lining Window Curtain Panel Set gives you multiple looks in one set, while adding luxury to your bedroom, living room, or dining room decor. These curtains offer you the best of both worlds because you have the option of nearly complete blackout or sheer together in one affordable curtain panel set. The classic solid-color design of the blackout lining panel fits in nearly any home decor style. The white sheer overlay panel allows lots of natural light to enter your space while still providing some privacy from onlookers. The blackout panels are energy efficient and help you enjoy your privacy with additional benefit of reducing outside noise. Ideal for those in need of daytime rest, whether you work the night shift or have a little one who requires daytime naps, these blackout curtains create the perfect environment for uninterrupted sleep. Not to mention, the blackout lining will help keep your home cool in the summer and warm in the winter by blocking the sunlight and keeping temperatures stable. With 2 layers, the styling options are endless with these functional window panels, letting you customize your look using tie backs (not included). They can easily be used in farmhouse, modern, traditional and many other design themes. Each set includes two panels, each measuring 38 inches in width, and is available in multiple length options. Easily install these curtains with the metal grommets by sliding each panel onto your curtain rod. To care for these curtains simply machine wash and hang to dry. Please refer to label for full care instructions. Please note: the tiebacks shown in some photos are not included with the Sheer Grommet With Insulated Blackout Lining Curtain Panel Set and will have to be purchased separately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lush Décor is a brand of Triangle Home Fashions. From its creation, Triangle Home Fashions has focused on three core values: design, quality and innovation. Since that time, it has grown and evolved into a home textiles company that values and nurtures its relationships with its customers. We are challenged every day is to design and develop the best in home textiles, offering unique fabrics with incredible detailed surface treatments so our customers always feel that what they are buying is on trend, long lasting and most importantly a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE these curtains!!!
reviews.reviewText: I thought these curtains were really cute when I bought them but when I put them up I loved them even more. They are excellent at keeping bright sun out and they make the room look elegant. They are a nice quality and definitely worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super nice quality!
reviews.reviewText: Loooooove these curtains! They are made of great quality, definitely looks more expensive than they are. I bought 5 packages of these because I have a lot of double windows in my living room. I did trim the ends due to them being too long but my windows must be a weird length. Would definitely purchase these again if I need more. The color was a perfect linen cream and I have also painted my walls White Dove since this picture was taken and the curtains blend well with the new wall color. I’ll update with a more recent picture.i also hung them up right out of the package, didn’t need to iron but could probably take a steamer to them for perfection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these in gray for our nursery and they’re perfect. They do not come with tie backs, but we have some mounted to the wall already. You can pull back the colored or sheer panel or both to change the look. They block a good amount of light and the sheer panels make the room feel more feminine and airy. The fabric is soft and medium thickness - do not feel or look cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love These Curtains
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these curtains. I love that both the material and the sewing are good quality. They match my home beautifully! I even cut some up to make matching dining room curtains. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better quality than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting an ok quality curtain, due to the affordable price, so I was pleasantly surprised at the great quality of what I received. The black out curtain is thick enough to block light, the sheer panel is as expected (tulle) and the color was as pictured. I was very happy with the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to iron these as they came very wrinkled but they are beautiful and really darken the room. I bought these for my living room and bedroom. I think I will purchase another pair for my dining room also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are beautiful and great quality. They hang perfectly. Absolutely a great buy for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just as pictured. Beautiful and well made. High quality.
Love them, Perfect for our guest room. We have different size of them all over our home, they're just beautiful ♥️
It's beautiful and blacks out well for me. I had to return as they couldnt cover the whole window because of the folds. So bought another similar but wider.
These curtains were the girly touch we wanted for our nursery! They don’t come with a tie for the sheer panel but otherwise they are perfect.
So cute and match my nursery decor perfect
Beautiful set of drapes! Perfect for our nursery!
